Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Hotel Alte Feuerwache in Berlin (Lichtenberg), you'll be convenient to Lido Orankesee and Sportforum. This hotel is within close proximity of Weissensee Park and Eastgate Shopping Centre.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 26 guestrooms. Wireless Internet access (surcharge) keeps you connected, and cable programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and hair dryers. Conveniences include complimentary weekday newspapers, housekeeping is provided daily, and cribs/infant beds (surcharge) can be requested.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take in the views from a terrace and make use of amenities such as wireless Internet access (surcharge) and concierge services.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include express check-in, express check-out, and complimentary newspapers in the lobby.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is 11 AM
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of room service (during limited hours). Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

With a stay at Hotel Alte Feuerwache in Berlin (Lichtenberg), you'll be convenient to Lido Orankesee and Sportforum. This hotel is within close proximity of Weissensee Park and Eastgate Shopping Centre.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Lido Orankesee - 0.9 km / 0.5 mi
Sportforum - 1.7 km / 1.1 mi
Weissensee Park - 2.2 km / 1.4 mi
Eastgate Shopping Centre - 3.3 km / 2 mi
Bim and Boom Children's Playground - 3.3 km / 2.1 mi
Velodrom - 3.4 km / 2.1 mi
Stasi Museum Berlin - 3.5 km / 2.2 mi
Volkspark Friedrichshain - 4.2 km / 2.6 mi
Simon-Dach-Strasse - 4.5 km / 2.8 mi
Friedrichsfelde Palace - 5 km / 3.1 mi
Kollwitzplatz - 5.3 km / 3.3 mi
World's Garden - 5.4 km / 3.3 mi
Schonhauser Allee Arkaden - 5.4 km / 3.4 mi
O2 World - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi
Tierpark Berlin - 5.6 km / 3.5 mi

The nearest airports are:
Berlin (TXL-Tegel) - 13.5 km / 8.4 mi
Berlin (SXF-Schoenefeld) - 17.3 km / 10.7 mi

The preferred airport for Hotel Alte Feuerwache is Berlin (TXL-Tegel).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.
